HOW SITUATED. A Lodge is situated due east and west, because King Solomon’s Temple was so situated. Moses, by Divine command, having conducted the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage, through the Red Sea, into the wilderness, erected a Tabernacle to God, which he situated due east and west, to commemo - rate to the latest posterity that miraculous east wind which wrought their mighty deliverance. King Solomon’s Temple is said to have been a representation of that Tabernacle. TO WHOM DEDICATED. In going around this circle, we necessarily touch upon these two lines, as well as upon the Holy Scriptures, and while a Mason keeps himself thus circum - scribed, it is impossible that he should materially err.
